tool_description: API for deep learning text analytics
name: Text analytics
title: Text analytics

api_list.name: sentiment analysis
api_list.description: Get sentiment from the text (positive or negative)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://text-analytics7.p.rapidapi.com/sentiment"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-analytics7.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://text-analytics7.p.rapidapi.com/sentiment"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-analytics7.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
